text: Osɨmtɨzir ia bativiba, da osɨmtɨzir kabanagh da gumaziba bar me batifi. Ezɨ God uan akar dɨkɨrɨzimɨn gɨn ghua, egh osɨmtɨzir ian gavgavibagh afirazɨ tam ateghtɨ, a ia batoghan kogham. Osɨmtɨziba ia batoghtɨ, God ian akuraghsɨ tuavim damigham. Tuavir kam kamakɨn: a ia damightɨ, ia tuivigh gavgavigham, eghtɨ osɨmtɨzir kam ia abɨraghan kogham.
